traits.name: Flaming Weapon (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the guard can wreath one melee weapon it is wielding in flame. The guard is unharmed by this fire, which lasts until the end of the guard's next turn. While wreathed in flame, the weapon deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage on a hit.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The guard makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 6 (1d10 + 1 damage) piercing damage.
